com.facebook.litho.widget

Class LinearLayoutInfo.ViewportFiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.widget.LinearLayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
    Enclosing class:
    LinearLayoutInfo

    public static class LinearLayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
extends Object
implements LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
    Simple implementation of LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller which fills the viewport by laying out items sequentially.

      boolean wantsMore()

    • Method Detail

      • wantsMore

        public boolean wantsMore()
        Description copied from interface: LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
        Implementations should return true if they need more views to be computed in order to fill the screen.
        Specified by:
        wantsMore in interface LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller

      • add

        public void add(RenderInfo renderInfo,
                int width,
                int height)
        Description copied from interface: LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
        This will be called to inform implementations that the next layout has been computed. Implementations should use the width/height to determine whether they still need more views to fill their initial viewport (which should be reflected in the next call to LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller.wantsMore()
        Specified by:
        add in interface LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller

      • getFill

        public int getFill()
        Description copied from interface: LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
        Return the fill along the main axis (i.e. height for VERTICAL and width for HORIZONTAL), this method is available after LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller.add(RenderInfo, int, int) is called.
        Specified by:
        getFill in interface LayoutInfo.ViewportFiller
